text: At the 1896 Summer Olympics, there were 4 swimming events. All of the competitors were for men. They were planned by the Sub-Committee for Nautical Sports. All events were on 11 April in the Bay of Zea. There were 13 swimmers from 4 nations. ==Medal table== ==Medal summary== These medals given afterwards by the International Olympic Committee. At the time, winners were given a silver medal. Every other places were not given medals. 100 m freestyle not known 500 m freestyle 1200 m freestyle not known Sailors 100 m freestyle ==Nations== 13 swimmers from 4 nations swam at the Athens Games. * * * * ==Sub-Committee for Nautical Sports== * Prince George of Greece, president * Pavlos Damalas, secretary * Dimitrios Kriezis * Konstantinos Sachtouris * Georgios Koundouriotis * Dimitrios Argyropoulos * Konstantinos Kanaris * K. Argyrakis ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1896 Summer Olympics events 1896
title: Swimming at the 1896 Summer Olympics
